page.title: 14LLANELLY HILL FETE
page.content: On Saturday the thirteenth of July 1985,there was a Fete on Llanelly Hill on the football ground.Mr Roberts (The Headmaster of the school and the third and fourth year teacher) opened it. There was a raffle and the prize was a sun lounger.Shan Williams won it(She is a helper of the infants). There were also races which you could take part in,everybody enjoyed it,even if they didn't take part. There were stalls which you could buy sweets from.Stalls which you could buy cakes.Stalls which you could buy jumble sale clothes.There were also stalls which you could have a chance of winning a funny bunny,putting a five pence piece on a fifty pence piece,and if you did you would win
